plentry.pd: 0: Read-only mode: Users only read the data without modifying anything. 用户仅获取 SDK 返回的原始数据，不作任何修改。 For example, when users acquire the data with the Agora SDK, then push the RTMP or RTMPS streams.
1: Write-only mode: Users replace the data with their own data and pass the data to the SDK for encoding. 用户替换 SDK 返回的原始视频，并返回给 SDK 进行编码传输。 For example, when users acquire the data.

2: Read and write mode: Users read the data from , modify it, and then play it. 用户修改 SDK 返回的原始视频，并返回给 SDK 进行编码传输。 For example, when users have their own sound-effect processing module and perform some voice pre-processing, such as a voice change.
